snippet: EDELMAN--Myra, died peacefully Sunday, May 29, 2016. She is survived by her loving husband Larry, children Debra, Robin and David, Wayne and Merritt and grandchildren Macie and Georgie. Graveside Service Tuesday, May 31st, 11:30am at New Montefiore Cemetery, Farmingdale, NY. 1/3
lead_paragraph: EDELMAN--Myra, died peacefully Sunday, May 29, 2016. She is survived by her loving husband Larry, children Debra, Robin and David, Wayne and Merritt and grandchildren Macie and Georgie. Graveside Service Tuesday, May 31st, 11:30am at New Montefiore Cemetery, Farmingdale, NY. 1/3
